14#include <config.h>
15
16#include <isc/log.h>
17#include <isc/print.h>
18
19#include <dns/message.h>
20#include <dns/rdataset.h>
21#include <dns/result.h>
22#include <dns/tsig.h>
23#include <dns/view.h>
24#include <dns/zone.h>
25#include <dns/zt.h>
26
27#include <ns/log.h>
28#include <ns/notify.h>
29#include <ns/types.h>
30
31/*! \file
32 * \brief
33 * This module implements notify as in RFC1996.
34 */
35
36static void
37notify_log(ns_client_t *client, int level, const char *fmt, ...) {
38 va_list ap;
39
40 va_start(ap, fmt);
41 ns_client_logv(client, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_NOTIFY, NS_LOGMODULE_NOTIFY,
42 level, fmt, ap);
43 va_end(ap);
44}
45
46static void
47respond(ns_client_t *client, isc_result_t result) {
48 dns_rcode_t rcode;
49 dns_message_t *message;
50 isc_result_t msg_result;
51
52 message = client->message;
53 rcode = dns_result_torcode(result);
54
55 msg_result = dns_message_reply(message, true);
56 if (msg_result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
57 msg_result = dns_message_reply(message, false);
58 if (msg_result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
59 ns_client_next(client, msg_result);
60 return;
61 }
62 message->rcode = rcode;
63 if (rcode == dns_rcode_noerror)
64 message->flags |= DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_AA;
65 else
66 message->flags &= ~DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_AA;
67 ns_client_send(client);
68}
69
70void
71ns_notify_start(ns_client_t *client) {
72 dns_message_t *request = client->message;
73 isc_result_t result;
74 dns_name_t *zonename;
75 dns_rdataset_t *zone_rdataset;
76 dns_zone_t *zone = NULL;
77 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
78 char tsigbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE * 2 + sizeof(": TSIG '' ()")];
79 dns_tsigkey_t *tsigkey;
80
81 /*
82 * Interpret the question section.
83 */
84 result = dns_message_firstname(request, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION);
85 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
86 notify_log(client, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
87 "notify question section empty");
88 result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
89 goto done;
90 }
91
92 /*
93 * The question section must contain exactly one question.
94 */
95 zonename = NULL;
96 dns_message_currentname(request, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION, &zonename);
97 zone_rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(zonename->list);
98 if (ISC_LIST_NEXT(zone_rdataset, link) != NULL) {
99 notify_log(client, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
100 "notify question section contains multiple RRs");
101 result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
102 goto done;
103 }
104
105 /* The zone section must have exactly one name. */
106 result = dns_message_nextname(request, DNS_SECTION_ZONE);
107 if (result != ISC_R_NOMORE) {
108 notify_log(client, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
109 "notify question section contains multiple RRs");
110 result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
111 goto done;
112 }
113
114 /* The one rdataset must be an SOA. */
115 if (zone_rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_soa) {
116 notify_log(client, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
117 "notify question section contains no SOA");
118 result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
119 goto done;
120 }
121
122 tsigkey = dns_message_gettsigkey(request);
123 if (tsigkey != NULL) {
124 dns_name_format(&tsigkey->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
125
126 if (tsigkey->generated) {
127 char cnamebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
128 dns_name_format(tsigkey->creator, cnamebuf,
129 sizeof(cnamebuf));
130 snprintf(tsigbuf, sizeof(tsigbuf), ": TSIG '%s' (%s)",
131 namebuf, cnamebuf);
132 } else {
133 snprintf(tsigbuf, sizeof(tsigbuf), ": TSIG '%s'",
134 namebuf);
135 }
136 } else
137 tsigbuf[0] = '\0';
138
139 dns_name_format(zonename, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
140 result = dns_zt_find(client->view->zonetable, zonename, 0, NULL, &zone);
141 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
142 dns_zonetype_t zonetype = dns_zone_gettype(zone);
143
144 if ((zonetype == dns_zone_master) ||
145 (zonetype == dns_zone_slave) ||
146 (zonetype == dns_zone_mirror) ||
147 (zonetype == dns_zone_stub))
148 {
149 isc_sockaddr_t *from = ns_client_getsockaddr(client);
150 isc_sockaddr_t *to = ns_client_getdestaddr(client);
151 notify_log(client, ISC_LOG_INFO,
152 "received notify for zone '%s'%s",
153 namebuf, tsigbuf);
154 result = dns_zone_notifyreceive(zone, from, to,
155 request);
156 goto done;
157 }
158 }
159
160 notify_log(client, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
161 "received notify for zone '%s'%s: not authoritative",
162 namebuf, tsigbuf);
163 result = DNS_R_NOTAUTH;
164
165 done:
166 if (zone != NULL)
167 dns_zone_detach(&zone);
168 respond(client, result);
169}
